application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Norway Maple - Reduce to previous points & deadwood (approx 3m).T.2 Horse chestnut - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.3 Ash - Fell  (too close to garages).
